game.name: Car Dealership Simulator 2
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Take charge of the car trade with Car Dealership Simulator 2! Buy, modify, and grow your dealership with strategic sales. Every opportunity will take you closer to the top of the automotive market!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Take charge of the car trade with Car Dealership Simulator 2! Buy, modify, and grow your dealership with strategic sales. Every opportunity will take you closer to the top of the automotive market!
